title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister for Education) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister education) order 2021

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 2. Eoin Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Eoin Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Education, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
the Minister for Education with effect from 8 December 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

23 February, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [83] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
